dct_title_s: The World on a globular projection
dct_description_sm: "Entered according to act of Congress." Inset: A chart exhibiting the progress of Christianity from the birth of our Saviour to the present time. "The Earth is supposed by some to contain 800 millions of inhabitants ... Hassel [i.e. Georg Hassel, 1770-1829] estimates the number at about 700 millions ... "
